meanings.definition: Trembling or shaking with fear or excitement
meanings.sent1: His quiveringly hands betrayed his nervousness before the performance.
meanings.sent2: The quiveringly voice of the singer added emotion to the song.
meanings.sent3: The quiveringly rabbit darted across the field, startled by a noise.
meanings.sent4: The quiveringly crowd awaited the results of the competition.
meanings.sent5: Her quiveringly smile showed both fear and excitement before the roller coaster ride.
